ticket_title: Add Auto-Resume Scheduler for Paused Subscriptions
summary: Stripe billing integration missing - subscriptions not resumed in Stripe

failures.error: Code at apps/server/src/features/scheduler/resumePausedOrgs.ts:75-78 contains only a TODO comment for Stripe integration. No actual Stripe API call to resume subscriptions is implemented.
Pre-existing TypeScript errors in test files across @ghost-greeter/widget and @ghost-greeter/server packages (unrelated to TKT-004B)
Build fails due to TypeScript errors in test files being included in compilation (unrelated to TKT-004B)

recommendation: Add Stripe API integration to resume subscriptions when organizations are auto-resumed. Use stripe.subscriptions.resume() or stripe.subscriptions.update() to restart billing. Also consider fixing the pre-existing build issues by excluding test files from the build process.
